benchmark_details.name: FACap (Fashion Automatic Caption)
benchmark_details.overview: FACap is a large-scale fashion-domain composed image retrieval (CIR) dataset with fine-grained annotations, generated automatically to support the retrieval of fashion images based on user preferences and alterations.
benchmark_details.data_type: triples of <reference image, modification text, target image>

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a high-quality dataset for composed image retrieval in the fashion domain with detailed annotations.

data.source: Automatically constructed from web-sourced fashion images using a two-stage annotation pipeline with vision-language models and a large language model.
data.annotation: Generated automatically using a vision-language model and a large language model.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation is done using the recall metric, measuring how many target images appear in the top-k retrieved images.
methodology.interpretation: Higher recall values indicate better performance in retrieving relevant fashion images based on user queries.
methodology.validation: Quality evaluation through manual assessment of randomly sampled triplets.
